title: olso net logo font
content:
Hi friends

I need your help, please help me id the font used for the logo olso net

Thanks in advance

Miguel

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317130703im_/http:/typophile.com/files/olso_net_6467.jpg)
author: hernando

comments.content: I believe it's a monospaced font like Lucida Console.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/microsoft/lucida-console/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317130703/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/microsoft/lucida-console/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/microsoft/lucida-console/")

Check your computer, it might already be installed there.
